org.springframework.test.web.client

Interface RequestMatcher


  • public interface RequestMatcher
    A contract for matching requests to expectations.
    Since:
    3.2
    Author:
    Craig Walls

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void match(ClientHttpRequest request)
      Match the given request against some expectations.

    • Method Detail

      • match

        void match(ClientHttpRequest request)
           throws IOException,
                  AssertionError
        Match the given request against some expectations.
        Parameters:
        request - the request to make assertions on
        Throws:
        IOException - in case of I/O errors
        AssertionError - if expectations are not met
